author: Sam Reynolds
title: Core Scientific Could Top $30 on CoreWeave Buyout Deal: Cantor Fitzgerald
description: A new Cantor Fitzgerald report argues that bitcoin miner Core Scientific is worth far more than the markets believe, thanks to its strategic role in powering AI.
content: In a research note released late Thursday, Cantor Fitzgerald says Core Scientific (CORZ) could fetch over $30 per share in a potential acquisition by cloud compute giant CoreWeave, citing both the lo… [+3155 chars]
